summary: Represents an iOS‑style action button for use inside a CupertinoAlertDialog. It shows a text label, can be flagged as the default or destructive option, and fires a click event when tapped. Appearance can be customized through text styling.
business_intent: Provide developers with a platform‑consistent, interactive button to capture user decisions in Cupertino alert dialogs, supporting primary, secondary, and destructive actions and handling click callbacks.
